auth.emailSent: We sent a confirmation link to your email address. Click the link in the email to complete your registration.
auth.linkExpires: The link will expire in 1 hour.
auth.emailNotConfiguredDesc: Email sending is not configured on the server. Use the token below to confirm your account manually.
auth.demoEmailRequired: Please enter email and name for demo
auth.rentersUseLink: Renters: Use the link provided by your landlord

property.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this property? This will also delete all associated bills and renters.
property.noProperties: No properties yet. Add your first property to get started.

renter.rentDayHelp: Day of month when rent is due (1-28)
renter.startContractDateHelp: Optional start date of the contract
renter.rentAmountHelp: Will be converted to RON automatically if needed
renter.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this renter? This will also delete all associated bills.
renter.requiredFields: Name, rent amount, and rent day are required
renter.accessLinkDescription: Share this link with your renter. They can use it to view and pay their bills without logging in.
renter.whatsAppUnavailable: WhatsApp sharing requires both your phone number and the renter's phone number to be set.
renter.whatsAppMessage: Hello! Here's your renter access link: {link}

bill.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this bill?
bill.noBills: No bills for this property yet.

supplier.noSuppliers: No suppliers with credentials configured for this property
supplier.multipleContractsFound: Multiple contracts were found. Please select which contract to use for each supplier.
supplier.contractSelectionsSaved: Contract selections saved. You can sync bills again to filter by selected contracts.
supplier.credentialsManagedInSettings: Credentials are managed globally in Settings. Configure them once and use across all properties.
supplier.deleteCredentialConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete these credentials?
supplier.newPasswordPlaceholder: Enter new password (leave blank to keep existing)
supplier.removeConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove this supplier from the property?
supplier.noAssignedSuppliers: No suppliers assigned to properties. Add suppliers in the Properties dashboard to set up credentials.
supplier.refreshRentBillsDescription: Generate rent bills for all tenants dated on the calculated due date (warning days before due, but no less than 1st of the month). The month number will be used as the bill number.
supplier.syncDescription: Generate rent bills and sync email bills
supplier.noNewRentBills: No new rent bills (may already exist for this period)

ebloc.multipleMatches: Multiple matches found. Please select the correct association:
ebloc.noMatch: No exact match found. Please select the correct association:
ebloc.importDesc: Connect your e-bloc.ro account to discover and import properties. This will also import outstanding balances and payment receipts.
ebloc.privacyNote: Your credentials are used only for this one-time import and are NOT saved. For best results with automatic bill assignment, we recommend adding complete property addresses.
ebloc.enterUsernamePassword: Please enter both username and password
ebloc.noPropertiesFound: No properties found in your e-bloc account. Please check your credentials.
ebloc.propertiesDiscoveredButFailedToSave: Properties discovered, but failed to save credentials: {error}. Please configure credentials manually.
ebloc.failedToDiscover: Failed to discover properties. Please check your credentials and try again.
ebloc.propertyNotFoundInMemory: Selected property not found in discovered properties. Please discover properties again.

billParser.title: Bill Parser Test/Learn
billParser.noPatternsYet: No patterns yet. Add one to customize extraction.
billParser.billNumberPattern: Bill Number Pattern (regex with capture group)

admin.refreshPatternsDesc: Refresh extraction patterns from JSON files. Only patterns with newer modification times than the database will be updated.
admin.forceRefresh: Force refresh (update even if JSON is not newer)
admin.extractionPatternSupplierPlaceholder: Optional: Name used in extraction patterns
admin.supplierDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete
admin.supplierConnectedTo: This supplier is connected to {count} property/properties:
admin.removeReferences: You can choose to also remove all property-supplier references.
admin.billParserDesc: Parse and extract bill information from PDF documents.
admin.passwordRequired: Password is required for new users
admin.noPatternsUpdated: No patterns were updated. All JSON files are up to date.

settings.emailConfigDesc: Forward your utility bills to the email address below for automatic processing. We'll monitor this address for incoming bills and import them automatically.
settings.emailAddressLabel: Your Email Address for Bill Import
settings.syncEmailBillsDesc: Check your email inbox for new bills and import them automatically
settings.noEmailBillsFound: No new bills found in email
settings.upgradeMessage: Upgrade to add more properties. Contact admin for subscription.
settings.rentWarningHelp: Set the number of days (1-30) before rent due date to show a warning. Default is 5 days.
settings.rentCurrencyHelp: Select the preferred currency for displaying rent amounts. RON values will be converted and shown alongside.
settings.billCurrencyHelp: Select the preferred currency for displaying bill amounts. RON values will be converted and shown alongside.
settings.dateFormatHelp: Select how dates should be displayed throughout the application.
settings.phoneNumberDesc: Add your phone number with country code to enable WhatsApp sharing features.
settings.phoneNumberHelp: Enter your full phone number including country code (e.g., +40712345678). This is required for WhatsApp sharing.
settings.personalDetailsDesc: Configure your personal information for rent bills and payments.
settings.landlordNameHelp: Your name as it should appear on rent bills and payment requests.
settings.ibanHelp: Your IBAN for receiving rent payments. Must be a valid IBAN format.
settings.invalidIban: Invalid IBAN format. Please check and try again.
settings.personalEmailHelp: Your email address for receiving notifications.

errors.connectionError: Could not connect to backend. Make sure it is running.

addressWarning.title: Address Mismatch Warning
addressWarning.defaultMessage: Address mismatch detected. Please verify this is the correct property.

patternSelection.title: No Pattern Matched
patternSelection.warning: ⚠️ Warning: No extraction pattern was automatically detected for this PDF.
patternSelection.warningDetail: Since the pattern was not auto-detected, extraction may not work as expected. Please verify the extracted data carefully.
patternSelection.selectPattern: Select a pattern to use for extraction:

tools.label: Label
tools.supplierPlaceholder: Supplier name (used as legal_name if payment not selected)
tools.existingFieldsPreserved: Existing fields will be preserved. Add new fields below.
tools.uploadPdfToMatch: Upload a PDF to match against patterns
tools.uploadPdfToSeeMatches: Upload a PDF to see matching patterns sorted by confidence level
tools.noMatchingPatternsUpload: No matching patterns found. Upload a PDF to match against existing patterns.
tools.patternNameRequired: Pattern name and at least one field pattern required
tools.instructions: Instructions: Select the label text in the PDF. Use +/- buttons to adjust line offset (default: 0). If offset is 0, the value will be automatically extracted from the same line after the label.
